description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The PAT_RSN_VISIT_DX table holds the diagnoses that document the patient's reason for an outpatient visit.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_RSN_VISIT_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds the qualifier identifying the code set for the patient reason for visit diagnoses.

columns.name: PAT_RSN_VISIT_DX
columns.description: This item holds the diagnoses representing the patient's reason for the visit.
